headline: Reassessing General Mills After Strategic Product Innovations and a 25% Price Drop
summary: Wondering if General Mills is worth a closer look right now? If you have been searching for value in uncertain markets, this well-known brand could have some surprises up its sleeve. The stock price has seen minor ups and downs recently. It has risen 1.1% over the last week but remains down 25.4% year-to-date and 21.6% over the past year. Sentiment around General Mills has shifted following news about strategic product innovations and supply chain improvements, which have caught investors’...
